name: WAY HOME
description: You are lost in the forest. It seems that everything is bad and you are doomed to die from hunger and wild animals, but suddenly you have gone to the old road, which le–∞ds to the bridge over the river. What awaits you on the other side of the river? There is one way to find out - it's to cross the bridge ....
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Processor: Intel Celeron 2.6 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1000 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 11 compatible
